query:
SELECT f.id, f.title, f.fileSize, f.mimeType, f.url, f.fileKey,
       vt.id as transcript_id, vt.status as transcript_status, vt.errorMessage, vt.updatedAt as transcript_updated
FROM files f 
LEFT JOIN video_transcripts vt ON vt.fileId = f.id
WHERE f.id = 1770203;
